BasicHttpRelaySecurityElement BasicHttpRelaySecurityElement Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceBus.Configuration
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll

Represents a configuration element that configures the security for a basic HTTP relay binding.

Edit

In this Article

public sealed class BasicHttpRelaySecurityElement : ConfigurationElementPublic NotInheritable Class BasicHttpRelaySecurityElement

Properties

Message Message

Edit

Gets a Configuration element that specifies the message-level security settings for a BasicHttpRelayBinding.

[ConfigurationProperty("message")]
public BasicHttpRelayMessageSecurityElement Message { get; }<ConfigurationProperty("message")>
Public ReadOnly Property Message As BasicHttpRelayMessageSecurityElement
Value
BasicHttpRelayMessageSecurityElement BasicHttpRelayMessageSecurityElement

Returns a BasicHttpRelayMessageSecurityElement that contains the security settings.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Mode Mode

Edit

Gets or sets the security mode for a BasicHttpRelayBinding.

[ConfigurationProperty("mode", DefaultValue = EndToEndBasicHttpSecurityMode.Transport)]
public EndToEndBasicHttpSecurityMode Mode { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("mode", DefaultValue:=EndToEndBasicHttpSecurityMode.Transport)>
Public Property Mode As EndToEndBasicHttpSecurityMode
Value
EndToEndBasicHttpSecurityMode EndToEndBasicHttpSecurityMode

Returns a value from the EndToEndBasicHttpSecurityMode enumeration. The default value is none.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Edit

Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection ConfigurationPropertyCollection
Overrides
ConfigurationElement.PropertiesConfigurationElement.Properties

RelayClientAuthenticationType RelayClientAuthenticationType

Edit

Gets or sets the authentication type specified in this configuration element.

[ConfigurationProperty("relayClientAuthenticationType")]
public RelayClientAuthenticationType RelayClientAuthenticationType { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("relayClientAuthenticationType")>
Public Property RelayClientAuthenticationType As RelayClientAuthenticationType
Value
RelayClientAuthenticationType RelayClientAuthenticationType

Returns a value from RelayClientAuthenticationType that contains the type of authentication to be used by binding elements the current instance is applied to.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Transport Transport

Edit

Gets a configuration element that specifies the transport-level security settings for a BasicHttpRelayBinding binding.

[ConfigurationProperty("transport")]
public HttpRelayTransportSecurityElement Transport { get; }<ConfigurationProperty("transport")>
Public ReadOnly Property Transport As HttpRelayTransportSecurityElement
Value
HttpRelayTransportSecurityElement HttpRelayTransportSecurityElement

Returns a HttpRelayTransportSecurityElement that contains properties that control authentication parameters for the HTTP transport.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute
